name: ProjectAssistant
description: An assistant focused on understanding, navigating, and evolving the Hermes codebase. It helps with code comprehension, refactoring, integration points (e.g., Azure DevOps, storage, Teams), and test-guided development within this repository.

capabilities.name: Newsletter Generation
capabilities.description: Generate, refine, and maintain newsletter content based on data and features from the Hermes system, including summarizing recent changes, surfacing key metrics, and formatting content for communication channels such as email or Teams.

capabilities.name: Parent Hierarchy Validator
capabilities.description: Validate and analyze hierarchical relationships (for example, parent/child links in storage documents or Azure DevOps work items), detect broken or cyclic hierarchies, and suggest or apply corrections according to Hermes business rules.

capabilities.name: RegisterSlaNotifications
capabilities.description: Register users to receive daily SLA violation notifications for their work items and direct reports. Automatically discovers manager status and direct reports via Microsoft Graph.

capabilities.name: CheckSlaViolations
capabilities.description: Perform immediate on-demand check for SLA violations. Works for both registered and unregistered users. Managers see team-wide violations grouped by owner.

capabilities.name: UnregisterSlaNotifications
capabilities.description: Remove user from daily SLA notification list. User will no longer receive scheduled SLA reports but can still use on-demand checks.

capabilities.name: Discover User Pull Request Activity
capabilities.description: Discover and summarize user pull request activity over past n days.
